name: Tiny Pastry Chef Baking Dash
description:
Do you have what it takes to become the best pastry chef?

Feast your eyes with tasty, yummy and mouth-watering treats!

Your objective is to help our Chef gather recipe by tapping the needed items!

It won't be easy! The treats you need will be placed among other treats.

You must not touch the wrong treat or you will have to start all over again!

So DOWNLOAD NOW to enjoy this yummy puzzle treat!
